1: וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לָ֖הּ נָעֳמִ֣י <sup>5281 </sup> <n>Then Naomi</n> חֲמוֹתָ֑הּ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>her mother in law</n> בִּתִּ֞י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>unto her My daughter</n> הֲלֹ֧א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֲבַקֶּשׁ־ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>shall I not seek</n> לָ֛ךְ מָנ֖וֹחַ <sup>4494 </sup> <n>rest</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that it</n> יִֽיטַב־ <sup>3190 </sup> <n>for thee that it may be well</n> לָֽךְ׃
2: וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> הֲלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> בֹ֙עַז֙ <sup>1162 </sup> <n>And now [is] not Boaz</n> מֹֽדַעְתָּ֔נוּ <sup>4130 </sup> <n>of our kindred</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whose</n> הָיִ֖ית <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> נַעֲרוֹתָ֑יו <sup>5291 </sup> <n>with whose maidens</n> הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> ה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> זֹרֶ֛ה <sup>2219 </sup> <n>thou wast? Behold he winnoweth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גֹּ֥רֶן <sup>1637 </sup> <n>in the threshingfloor</n> הַשְּׂעֹרִ֖ים <sup>8184 </sup> <n>barley</n> הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>to night</n>
3: וְרָחַ֣צְתְּ ׀ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>Wash</n> וָסַ֗כְתְּ <sup>5480 </sup> <n>thyself therefore and anoint</n> וְשַׂ֧מְתְּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>thee and put</n> [שִׂמְלֹתֵךְ כ] (שִׂמְלֹתַ֛יִךְ <sup>8071 </sup> <n>apparel</n> ק) עָלַ֖יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> [וְיָרַדְתִּי כ] (וְיָרַ֣דְתְּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>descend</n> ק) הַגֹּ֑רֶן <sup>1637 </sup> <n>to the floor</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּוָּדְעִ֣י <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[but] make not thyself known</n> לָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto the man</n> עַ֥ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> כַּלֹּת֖וֹ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>until he shall have done</n> לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>eating</n> וְלִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drinking</n>
4: וִיהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בְשָׁכְב֗וֹ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>And it shall be when he lieth down</n> וְיָדַ֙עַתְּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>that thou shalt mark</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמָּקוֹם֙ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>the place</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> יִשְׁכַּב־ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>where he shall lie</n> שָׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and you</n> וּבָ֛את <sup>935 </sup> <n>and thou shalt go in</n> וְגִלִּ֥ית <sup>1540 </sup> <n>and uncover</n> מַרְגְּלֹתָ֖יו <sup>4772 </sup> <n>his feet</n> [וְשָׁכָבְתִּי כ] (וְשָׁכָ֑בְתְּ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>down</n> ק) וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יַגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and he will tell</n> לָ֔ךְ אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> תַּעַשִֽׂין׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thee what thou shalt do</n>
5: וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And she said</n> אֵלֶ֑יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> כֹּ֛ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> תֹּאמְרִ֥י <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto her All that thou sayest</n> (אֵלַ֖י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> ק) אֶֽעֱשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>unto me I will do</n>
6: וַתֵּ֖רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>And she went down</n> הַגֹּ֑רֶן <sup>1637 </sup> <n>unto the floor</n> וַתַּ֕עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and did</n> כְּכֹ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוַּ֖תָּה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>bade</n> חֲמוֹתָֽהּ׃ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>according to all that her mother in law</n>
7: וַיֹּ֨אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>had eaten</n> בֹּ֤עַז <sup>1162 </sup> <n>And when Boaz</n> וַיֵּשְׁתְּ֙ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drunk</n> וַיִּיטַ֣ב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>was merry</n> לִבּ֔וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>and his heart</n> וַיָּבֹ֕א <sup>935 </sup> <n>he went</n> לִשְׁכַּ֖ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>to lie down</n> בִּקְצֵ֣ה <sup>7097 </sup> <n>at the end</n> הָעֲרֵמָ֑ה <sup>6194 </sup> <n>of the heap of corn</n> וַתָּבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and she came</n> בַלָּ֔ט <sup>3909 </sup> <n>softly</n> וַתְּגַ֥ל <sup>1540 </sup> <n>and uncovered</n> מַרְגְּלֹתָ֖יו <sup>4772 </sup> <n>his feet</n> וַתִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>and laid her down</n>
8: וַיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> בַּחֲצִ֣י <sup>2677 </sup> <n>the middle</n> הַלַּ֔יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>of the night</n> וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <sup>2729 </sup> <n>was afraid</n> הָאִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>that the man</n> וַיִּלָּפֵ֑ת <sup>3943 </sup> <n>and turned</n> וְהִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> אִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>himself and behold a woman</n> שֹׁכֶ֖בֶת <sup>7901 </sup> <n>lay</n> מַרְגְּלֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>4772 </sup> <n>at his feet</n>
9: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> אָ֑תּ <sup>859 </sup> <n>and she</n> וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Who [art] thou? And she answered</n> אָנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> ר֣וּת <sup>7327 </sup> <n>I [am] Ruth</n> אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <sup>519 </sup> <n>thine handmaid</n> וּפָרַשְׂתָּ֤ <sup>6566 </sup> <n>spread</n> כְנָפֶ֙ךָ֙ <sup>3671 </sup> <n>therefore thy skirt</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אֲמָ֣תְךָ֔ <sup>519 </sup> <n>over thine handmaid</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>are a</n> גֹאֵ֖ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>for thou [art] a near kinsman</n> אָֽתָּה׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>he</n>
10: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> בְּרוּכָ֨ה <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> אַ֤תְּ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> בִּתִּ֔י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>my daughter</n> הֵיטַ֛בְתְּ <sup>3190 </sup> <n>[for] thou hast shewed</n> חַסְדֵּ֥ךְ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>more kindness</n> הָאַחֲר֖וֹן <sup>314 </sup> <n>in the latter end</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <sup>7223 </sup> <n>than at the beginning</n> לְבִלְתִּי־ <sup>1115 </sup> <n>not</n> לֶ֗כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>going</n> אַחֲרֵי֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> הַבַּ֣חוּרִ֔ים <sup>970 </sup> <n>young men</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>whether</n> דַּ֖ל <sup>1800 </sup> <n>whether poor</n> וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>or</n> עָשִֽׁיר׃ <sup>6223 </sup> <n>or rich</n>
11: וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> בִּתִּי֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>And now my daughter</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <sup>3372 </sup> <n>fear</n> כֹּ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> תֹּאמְרִ֖י <sup>559 </sup> <n>to thee all that thou requirest</n> אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>not I will do</n> לָּ֑ךְ כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>doth know</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> שַׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>for all the city</n> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֥שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>woman</n> חַ֖יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>that thou [art] a virtuous</n> אָֽתְּ׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n>
12: וְעַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָמְנָ֔ם <sup>551 </sup> <n>And now it is true</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> [אִם <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> כ] גֹאֵ֖ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>that I [am thy] near kinsman</n> אָנֹ֑כִי <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> וְגַ֛ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>however</n> יֵ֥שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>howbeit there is</n> גֹּאֵ֖ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>a kinsman</n> קָר֥וֹב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>nearer</n> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n>
13: לִ֣ינִי ׀ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>Tarry</n> הַלַּ֗יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>this night</n> וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>comes</n> בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <sup>1242 </sup> <n>and it shall be in the morning</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> יִגְאָלֵ֥ךְ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>[that] if he will perform unto thee the part of a kinsman</n> טוֹב֙ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>well</n> יִגְאָ֔ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>let him do the kinsman's part</n> וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יַחְפֹּ֧ץ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>but if he will</n> לְגָֽאֳלֵ֛ךְ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>not do the part of a kinsman</n> וּגְאַלְתִּ֥יךְ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>to thee then will I do the part of a kinsman</n> אָנֹ֖כִי <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>liveth</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>to thee [as] the LORD</n> שִׁכְבִ֖י <sup>7901 </sup> <n>lie down</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <sup>1242 </sup> <n>until the morning</n>
14: וַתִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>And she lay</n> [מַרְגְּלָתַו כ] (מַרְגְּלֹותָיו֙ <sup>4772 </sup> <n>feet</n> ק) עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הַבֹּ֔קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>until the morning</n> וַתָּ֕קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and she rose up</n> [בִּטְרֹום כ] (בְּטֶ֛רֶם <sup>2958 </sup> <n>before</n> ק) יַכִּ֥יר <sup>5234 </sup> <n>could know</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>one</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רֵעֵ֑הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>another</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יִוָּדַ֔ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Let it not be known</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָ֥אָה <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>that a woman</n> הַגֹּֽרֶן׃ <sup>1637 </sup> <n>into the floor</n>
15: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Also he said</n> הָ֠בִי <sup>3051 </sup> <n>Bring</n> הַמִּטְפַּ֧חַת <sup>4304 </sup> <n>the vail</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> עָלַ֛יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is on</n> וְאֶֽחֳזִי־ <sup>270 </sup> <n>that [thou hast] upon thee and hold</n> בָ֖הּ וַתֹּ֣אחֶז <sup>270 </sup> <n>it And when she held</n> בָּ֑הּ וַיָּ֤מָד <sup>4058 </sup> <n>it he measured</n> שֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>six</n> שְׂעֹרִים֙ <sup>8184 </sup> <n>[measures] of barley</n> וַיָּ֣שֶׁת <sup>7896 </sup> <n>and laid</n> עָלֶ֔יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וַיָּבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>[it] on her and she went</n> הָעִֽיר׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>into the city</n>
16: וַתָּבוֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And when she came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> חֲמוֹתָ֔הּ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>to her mother in law</n> וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>she said</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>How</n> אַ֣תְּ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בִּתִּ֑י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>first</n> וַתַּ֨גֶּד־ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>bewray</n> לָ֔הּ אֵ֛ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>her all</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> עָֽשָׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>had done</n> לָ֖הּ הָאִֽישׁ׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>her all that the man</n>
17: וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And she said</n> שֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>These six</n> הַשְּׂעֹרִ֥ים <sup>8184 </sup> <n>[measures] of barley</n> הָאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> נָ֣תַן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> לִ֑י כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>he me for he said</n> (אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> ק) אַל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> תָּב֥וֹאִי <sup>935 </sup> <n>to me Go</n> רֵיקָ֖ם <sup>7387 </sup> <n>not empty</n> אֶל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> חֲמוֹתֵֽךְ׃ <sup>2545 </sup> <n>unto thy mother in law</n>
18: וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> שְׁבִ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>she Sit still</n> בִתִּ֔י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>my daughter</n> עַ֚ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> תֵּֽדְעִ֔ין <sup>3045 </sup> <n>until thou know</n> אֵ֖יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>how</n> יִפֹּ֣ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>will fall</n> דָּבָ֑ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>how the matter</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יִשְׁקֹט֙ <sup>8252 </sup> <n>will not be in rest</n> הָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>for the man</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>until</n> כִּלָּ֥ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>he have finished</n> הַדָּבָ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the thing</n> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n>
